name: The Christmas Factory
description:
"Save Christmas without distress"

The Christmas Factory is a video game inspired by the complexity of stress management at work.

It is possible to adjust the difficulty of the experience with different objectives and maximum stress levels.

How to play Team
  • Alejandra Martinez [Art]
  • Gaston Caminiti [Programming and Design]
